name: Substitute
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Substitute except Unown, Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Burmy, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Using 25% of its maximum HP, the user creates a substitute with 1 more HP than the amount of HP lost by the user. The Substitute takes damage and status moves, which doesn't affect the user. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with Infiltrator can hit through Substitute.
viability: Substitute is so common in any environment. it can absorb damage and allow for a Pokemon to set up entry hazard, Toxic-stall, set up boosting moves, anything. The most common ways to deal with Substitutes are to just break it, Hyper Voice, Bug Buzz, and Boomburst. It is absolutely worth running.
